About Me

I'm a dual-degree student in Mechanical Engineering and Electronic Systems with a strong academic record and hands-on experience in research and development. My expertise spans CAD design, additive manufacturing, and simulation technologies.

I've worked on diverse projects ranging from designing aerodynamic F1 car components to developing advanced 3D printing systems. I'm passionate about solving complex engineering problems, bringing innovative ideas to life, and exploring the world of high-performance engineering—especially in motorsport.
